# Introduction to phylogenetics

This introduction to the field of phylogenetics will be taught by [Dr. Conor Meehan](https://www.ntu.ac.uk/staff-profiles/science-technology/conor-meehan).

You can find the teaching materials on [his website](https://conmeehan.github.io/PathogenDataCourse/IntroToPhylogenetics) and on [Moodle](https://campus.itg.be/course/view.php?id=217).
